Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli

Class Cursor

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli.Cursor
public class Cursor extends Object
This class represents the cursor of the CLI. It is designed to be used as a singleton. It contains all the utility methods to draw on the terminal.

  • Field Summary

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static Cursor getInstance()
      Get the singleton instance of the cursor.
      Returns:
      the cursor

    • eraseScreen

      public void eraseScreen()
      Clear screen by scrolling down the terminal for HEIGHT rows.

    • clearScreen

      public void clearScreen()
      Clear screen by resetting each cell to default values. Different from eraseScreen() because this method doesn't scroll the terminal.

    • moveToXY

      public void moveToXY(int x, int y)
      Move the cursor to absolute position.
      Parameters:
      x - the x coordinate
      y - the y coordinate

    • uninstall

      public void uninstall()
      Uninstall the Ansi library from the terminal.

    • input

      public String input() throws InterruptedException
      This method listen for user input. Only one thread can listen at a time. If a new thread start listening to user input, the previous thread will be interrupted.
      Returns:
      the string entered by the user
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted because another thread is listening to user input

    • clearInput

      public void clearInput()
      This method stops any thread listening to user input.

    • input

      public String input(int x, int y) throws InterruptedException, IOException
      Listen for user input on a specific cell.
      Parameters:
      x - the x coordinate of the cell
      y - the y coordinate of the cell
      Returns:
      the string entered by the user
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted because another thread is listening to user input
      IOException - error listening to user input

    • print

      public void print(String s)
      Print a string at the current position.
      Parameters:
      s - the string to print

    • print

      public void print(String s, int x, int y)
      Print a string starting at the given position.
      Parameters:
      s - the string to print
      x - the x coordinate
      y - the y coordinate

    • print

      public void print(org.fusesource.jansi.Ansi a)
      Print a formatted string (Ansi) at the current position.
      Parameters:
      a - the ansi string to print

    • print

      public void print(org.fusesource.jansi.Ansi a, int x, int y)
      Print a formatted string (Ansi) starting at the given position.
      Parameters:
      a - the ansi string to print
      x - the x coordinate
      y - the y coordinate

    • printCentered

      public void printCentered(String string, int row)
      Print a string centered in the screen at the given row.
      Parameters:
      string - the string to print
      row - the row to print the string

    • printCentered

      public void printCentered(org.fusesource.jansi.Ansi ansi, int row)
      Print a formatted string (Ansi) centered in the screen at the current position.
      Parameters:
      ansi - the ansi string to print
      row - the row to print the string

    • realLength

      public int realLength(org.fusesource.jansi.Ansi a)
      Calculate the real length of a string. In other words, the length of the string without the length of the ANSI escape sequences.
      Parameters:
      a - the ansi string to calculate the length
      Returns:
      the real length of the string

    • realLength

      public int realLength(String s)
      Calculate the real length of a string. In other words, the length of the string without the length of the ANSI escape sequences.
      Parameters:
      s - the string to calculate the length
      Returns:
      the real length of the string

    • clearRow

      public void clearRow(int row)
      Clear the given row by resetting it to default values.
      Parameters:
      row - the row to clear

    • clearCell

      public void clearCell(int x, int y)
      Clear the specified cell by resetting it to default values
      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate of the cell to clear
      y - y coordinate of the cell to clear

    • moveRelative

      public void moveRelative(int xOffset, int yOffset)
      Move the cursor relative to the current position.
      Parameters:
      xOffset - the x offset, positive means right, negative means left
      yOffset - the y offset, positive means down, negative means up

    • saveCursorPosition

      public void saveCursorPosition()
      Store the current position of the cursor. To restore it later, use restoreCursorPosition().

    • restoreCursorPosition

      public void restoreCursorPosition()
      Restore the cursor position to the last saved position.

    • paintBackground

      public void paintBackground(int color, int width, int height)
      Paint the background of the terminal with the given color, starting at the given position and ending at currentX + width and currentY + height.
      Parameters:
      color - the color to paint
      width - the width of the area to paint
      height - the height of the area to paint

    • paintBackground

      public void paintBackground(int color, int xMin, int yMin, int xMax, int yMax)
      Paint a portion of the background of the terminal with the given color.
      Parameters:
      color - the color to paint
      xMin - the x coordinate of the top left corner of the area to paint (inclusive)
      yMin - the y coordinate of the top left corner of the area to paint (inclusive)
      xMax - the x coordinate of the bottom right corner of the area to paint (inclusive)
      yMax - the y coordinate of the bottom right corner of the area to paint (inclusive)
